allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Playwright + Applitools Eyes integration for visual testing

- Migrate from Selenium to Playwright for modern browser automation
- Integrate Applitools Eyes SDK for visual regression testing
- Implement complete Page Object Model for all pages \(Login, Inventory, Cart, Checkout\)
- Add baseline test for creating visual checkpoints
- Add visual defects test with 4 different UI bugs injection
- Create comprehensive documentation \(README.md, QUICKSTART.md\)
- Add configuration management with .env support
- Setup pytest fixtures for Eyes integration

Features:
- Full E2E test covering login → catalog → cart → checkout flow
- 4 visual checkpoints: Login, Inventory, Cart, Checkout pages
- Visual defects: hidden button, color changes, layout shifts, missing elements
- Production-ready test framework with detailed logging and reporting

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
